definition: (Chinese) National People's Congress/abbr. to 人大[Ren2 da4]
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4

definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4 Chang2 wu4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 全國人民代表大會常務委員會

sentences.english: The 10-day National People's Congress is a largely pro-forma affair.
sentences.chinese: 10天的全國人民代表大會很大程度上是一種形式。

sentences.english: The provisions of the preceding paragraph shall not apply to specially convened sessions of the National People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 臨時召集的全國人民代表大會會議不適用前款的規定。

sentences.english: Mr. Wei spoke to reporters on the sidelines of the National People’s Congress there.
sentences.chinese: 魏宏是向報道全國人民代表大會的記者做以上發言。

sentences.english: The right to amendment is vested in the National Peoples Congress.
sentences.chinese: 本法修改權屬於全國人民代表大會。

sentences.english: In theory, the commission's chairman is elected by the National People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 理論上，中央軍委主席由全國人民代表大會選舉。

sentences.english: A proposal on same-sex marriage was submitted to the National People's Congress, China's top legislature body.
sentences.chinese: 同性婚姻議題被呈交全國人民代表大會。

definition: PRC National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC), formed in 2003
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 he2 Gai3 ge2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
related.word: 國家發展和改革委員會
